title: Some problems I have
body:
So I'm a singed main right, and the item banshees Vail completely counters singeds all in with flip, only 1/4 of singeds spells break banshees, and that's his flip, flips mana cost is high early game so if a nasus, sion or even a darius rush banshees singed can't do shit, he has too waste 100 mana to break it once then actully flip them with 100 more mana.
Then by the time his next flip is up they have banshees again.
Before you say you rush tear and roa on singed please turn your device off its an outdated build (sunfire and rylias are core early game)
My suggestion is allow dot damages like singeds poison to break spell sheilds.

replies.body:
"Then by the time his next flip is up they have banshees again"

The shield requires 40 seconds without taking ANY damage from champions before it refreshes. In lane, it should only ever be able to block one flip then be on cd permanantly until they recall or one of you roams to another lane. If melee tanks (since they're about the only ones who could rush banshees viably) are managing to avoid a single aa or poison tick for 40 seconds without losing a TON of farm in lane, then thats your fault.
nope. Ludens does though, was my goto for popping banshees when i played nothing but singed.
